desc: What is Solar Energy & How Does it Work? Solar energy uses the sun’s light & heat to generate renewable or GREEN power. The most common form of solar energy is harnessed by solar panels or photovoltaic cells. The cells are created from semiconductor materials. When the sun’s rays hit the cells, it loosens electrons.

layout.text: "A Life On The Go Is Well Lived When You're Well Prepared"
Feel at home and get energized outside under the sun!
